body_html:
hello @CarlosYeverino ,
See this demo, which show your how to save it directly.

you can also check this demo, (03_cpp_forward) (04_caffe_to_caffe2) will show you how to load pretrained model(by python or by C++), then do a real image prediction.
body_text:
hello @CarlosYeverino ,
See this demo, which show your how to save it directly.
you can also check this demo, (03_cpp_forward) (04_caffe_to_caffe2) will show you how to load pretrained model(by python or by C++), then do a real image prediction.
body:
hello @CarlosYeverino ,
See this [demo](https://github.com/leonardvandriel/caffe2_cpp_tutorial/blob/master/src/caffe2/binaries/mnist.cc), which show your how to save it directly.

you can also check this [demo](https://github.com/BIGBALLON/Caffe2_Demo), (03_cpp_forward) (04_caffe_to_caffe2) will show you how to load pretrained model(by python or by C++), then do a real image prediction.
